install numpy and scipy


- download and install python C:/Python27
- download and install pip
- download compiled numpy and scipy for Maya
- open command prompt
- navigate to C:/Python27
- python -m pip install "Address to numpy.whl file" 
- copy folder "C:\Python27\Lib\site-packages\scipy" to "C:\Program Files\Autodesk\Maya2018\Python\Lib\site-packages"
